field.name: priceId
field.remark: Pricing identifier, multiple pricing identifiers can be included in one pricing plan

field.name: name
field.remark: A short description of pricing name.

field.name: priceType
field.remark: 0: Standard tariff 1: accumulate price 2: accumulate allowance 3: recurring free resource 4: one time free resource 5: discount on another discounted eligible charge 6: tax refund 7: recurring charge 8: billing discount 9: Handling Fee 10: 业务赠送 11: 业务累计
